summary: Theme tokens and premium shadow/glow values were updated to a sky-blue palette (index.css + tailwind.config.js). However, there is no evidence of the requested app-backdrop overlay gradient updates or the addition/usage of a new sky-blue background image asset. Two modified metadata/summary files appear unrelated to the theming requirements.

missing_requirements.requirement: Update the app-wide backdrop treatment to match the sky-blue theme by replacing the current sunset-orange tinted overlay gradients used by the .app-backdrop styling, while preserving layering (z-index), opacity behavior, and reduced-motion behavior for the subtle drift animation.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows color token and shadow updates, but no visible changes to any .app-backdrop CSS/gradient definitions, z-index/layering, or reduced-motion drift behavior.

missing_requirements.requirement: Add a new generated background image asset with a sky-blue art direction and update the app to use it as the app-backdrop background image URL.
missing_requirements.reason: No new files were added (Added: 0), and there is no evidence of a new image under frontend/public/assets/generated or any CSS update pointing .app-backdrop to a new image URL.

hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest (which is limited to a theme update); this file is unrelated to updating theme tokens/shadows/backdrop/image asset.
Not requested by the BuildRequest; theming changes did not require updating a repository summary file.
